title: [聊天|信息]BestEverChatManager&ChatSystem —— 超赞的轻量信息管理[1.7-1.11]
author: volta薯片~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 13:25 编辑 

Best Ever ChatManager & ChatSystem
最棒的聊天管理&系统插件

功能：
清屏特定世界禁止聊天格式加入TitleMOTD屏蔽服务器聊天可编辑的前缀加入&退出信息可编辑的信息！


指令&权限
/cm help | cm.use/cm joinmessage|cm.joinmessage/cm quitmessage | cm.quitmessage/cm join <message> | cm.join/cm quit <message> | cm.quit/cm mute | cm.mute/cm cc | cm.cc/cm setmotd | cm.setmotd/cm motd | cm.motd/cm clearmessage | cm.clearmessage/cm reload | cm.reload


支持作者

配置文件
#Custom server prefixs

prefix: '&7[ &4ChatManager &7] &f>'
MutePrefix: '&7[ &4ChatMute &7] &f>'
ChatClearPrefix: '&7[ &bChatClear &7] &f>'
AntiWordPrefix: '&7[ &cAntiWord &7] &f>'

#Custom QuitMessage
JoinMessage: '&e%player% &aJoined the game!'

#Custom JoinMessage
QuitMessage: '&e%player% &cLeft the game!'

#Custom mute messages
MuteON: '&cChat muted! write again to unmute.'
MuteOFF: '&aChat unmuted! write again to mute.'
MutedChat: '&c&lCHAT MUTED!'

#System motd
motd: '&aWelcome &csee my server :) &5join please!'

#Custom server chatformat
chatformat: '&7%name% &e> &6%message%'

#Custom server clearchat
ClearMessage: '&aChat Has been cleared by: &7%player%'

#Custom server reload command!
ReloadMessage: '&aPlugin has been reloaded'

#TitleMessages
Join Title: '&aWelcome &c%player%'
Join Subtitle: '&r&o&nServer Name'

#AntiWord option
AntiWord: '&cDo not use this word &7&o(%word%)'

WrongWords:
- asdasd复制代码
